title: Removing from vault no lockup and 1 day lock up options
content:
1. PROPOSAL DETAILS

 Remove from vault no lockup and 1 day lockup options encouraging people to lock their ember a longer time with higuer rewards.  



2. ECONOMIC IMPACT - Higher locks will have higher APR, getting out of circulation more ember and removing a possible sell presure from token. Also, it encourages long term actions because of the limited short-term staking options. 



3. IMPACT ON USERS - Users will loose their short term staking option but long term users will see rewarded their trust with higuer APR. 



4. EXPECTED POSITIVE IMPACT - More tokens will be locked more time beacause of more APR and less options. This will increase the long term supporters. 



5. KNOWN POTENTIAL OR NEGATIVE DOWNSIDES - People refusing to move to longer lock times can run away from ember and create a momentum sell pressure.
